import styles from './styling/header.module.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import { Context } from '../Context/AuthContext' import axios from 'axios' function Header(){ const {setAuthenticated, authenticated, userId} = useContext(Context) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/users/${userId}`) .then(() => { }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error.response.status) if(error.response.status === 401){ setAuthenticated(false) } }) }, []) return(
